attributes.action: A forest owned by the forestry commission can have Mountain-bike trails built on
attributes.additional_details: So less children will be playing on streets and learning how to mountain bike and play outside. As well, this will teach them how to construct structures.
attributes.background: That mountain bikers should be able to build trails freely as long as they do not interfere with other paths and bridle ways.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

We're not sure if you're referring to a specific forest or all Forestry Commission land. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
